BBEX3.A.AED.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in the United Arab Emirates / USD 1 = AED ... (selling)
General: The Dirham is pegged to the US dollar; until 17 February 2002, de jure pegged to the SDR.
Source: Since October 2007: Emirates NBD, Dubai 1981 - September 2007: National Bank of Dubai Ltd., Dubai
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end rates.
